1.content: "Hey........wake up....." you head a voice say. As soon as you hear that your body instantly shoots up but your vision is still blurred "huh where am I?" You say to yourself quietly as your vision becomes more clear you notice in front of you a female figure and as you look closely you notice that she's.......
1.title: awakening

11.content: You couldn't believe it but there was a giant human woman infront of you and as you inspect closer you notice that she's
11.title: A human girl

info.brief_description: This story is a new version of the MLP giantess anthro fetish game but with some changes
info.description:
Hello everyone I've decided that I wanted to change some things about the story because I really don't like the idea of what I had originally and it seemed more like horrible fanfiction than anything. So I decided to make this one more about the fetish asspect than the adventure asspect. However there will be some new rules for anyone wanting to add a chapter
Rules:
1. Like all interactives I want the main character to remain nameless
2.the character can't grow no matter what
3. Death is allowed and can go into as much detail as you'd like go nuts.
4. Only Characters from the show and movies are allowed (if you are adding a new character into the story let me know so I can OK it)
5.try to stick to more common fetishes and not ones you've made up or only you'd enjoy. A list for some of these common ones are:
-feet
-vore
-butt
-breast
Of course if you have a suggestion and a good amount of people to back you up then it can be permitted
6.have fun with the giantesses >: )
